scripts.codegen: pnpm run precodegen && cat ../../openapi.yaml | sed 's/$ref: event-lifecycle.md/lifecycle/' | docker run --rm -i mikefarah/yq e 'del(.. | .tags?)' - > ../../combined.yaml && docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/../../:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v6.2.1 generate --generate-alias-as-model -i local/combined.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o local/packages/api/build && rm ../../combined.yaml && pnpm run postcodegen
scripts.compile: tsup #leave as compile, we don't want build to trigger this in CI
